examples.example: 我们通过各种渠道获取丰富的信息，以更好地了解世界。

translate.english: We obtain rich information through various channels to better understand the world.

examples.example: 及时有效的信息能帮助我们更好地做出决策。

translate.english: Timely and effective information can help us make better decisions.

examples.example: 互联网让我们能快速便捷地获取各种信息，从而不断充实自己。

translate.english: The Internet enables us to obtain all kinds of information quickly and conveniently, thereby continuously enriching ourselves.
